scripts.bundle: npm run bundle:css && npm run bundle:js && npm run bundle:img && npm run bundle:sw && npm run bundle:unsplash
scripts.bundle:css: csso client/css/index.css static/css/min.css && csso client/css/unsplash.css static/css/unsplash.css
scripts.bundle:js: asbundle client/js/index.js --ignore=viperhtml | babel --no-babelrc --presets=@babel/env > static/js/index.js && npm run min
scripts.bundle:img: for f in $(ls static/img/*.jpg); do /usr/local/opt/mozjpeg/bin/cjpeg "$f" > tmp.jpg && mv tmp.jpg "$f" && ls -lh "$f"; done
scripts.bundle:sw: echo '(function (self, CACHE_NAME) {' > tmp.js && cat client/js/sw.js >> tmp.js && echo "}(self, '$(node -e 'var p=require("./package.json");console.log(p.name+"-"+p.version)')'));" >> tmp.js && uglifyjs --comments=/^!/ tmp.js -c -m -o static/sw.js && rm tmp.js
scripts.bundle:unsplash: cd static/img/; echo ''>>../css/unsplash.css; for f in $(ls *.jpg); do l=${#f}; m=${f:0:($l-4)}; echo "html.$m:before{background-image:url(../img/$m.jpg)}">>../css/unsplash.css; done
scripts.deploy: now -e NODE_ENV=production -e GH_CLIENT_ID=@gh-client-id -e GH_CLIENT_SECRET=@gh-client-secret -e HOOK_PRIVATE_KEY=@hook-private-key -e DEP_BOT_APP_ID=@hook-app-id -e DEP_BOT_WEBHOOK_SECRET=@hook-secret-token
scripts.min: echo '(function(){' > tmp.js && cat static/js/index.js >> tmp.js && echo '}());' >> tmp.js && uglifyjs --comments=/^!/ tmp.js -c -m -o static/js/min.js && rm tmp.js
